112.content:
During TDA, Courtney was glad to be back in the game. Not only did she have a chance at the million, but she got special treatment. She got to have her own bathroom and delicious food unlike the others. Everyone else was jealous of her, but Courtney didn't care about them. She enjoyed spiting Duncan by eating a four-star meal while Duncan ate Chef's crappy food.

However she didn't take into account how her luxurious lifestyle would affect her. Courtney often ate large meals to mock the other contestants that ended up fattening her up. Not to mention that she spent her time between challenges being lazy and playing with her PDA. Plus, with her private bathroom, she didn't have to hold in her farts until everyone fell asleep.

On the first night there, she managed to gain 3 pounds, which was very fast.

113.content:
(WRITTEN BY RACHEL ANARCHY
Courtney is exhausted from the run. "That... pant was more than I can handle." she said to herself. "You teens must be exhausted from the run." said Chris McLean, the show's host. "Well, I think I should say that the run was NOT the challenge!" "It wasn't?" Courtney thought. "If running wasn't the challenge, what was?" A buffet with delicious food was revealed. "The real challenge is to eat as much of this buffet as possible." Chris said.

"No, I probably shouldn't, I might overeat." Courtney thought. She was never one to eat much. Although, looking at the others indulging for a few seconds, she thought, "Maybe it won't hurt, everyone else is doing it, and after a week of Chef's disgusting meals, I'd be a fool to pass this up."
She gives in and starts eating. "This food is amazing." She thought, "I never get to enjoy this food at home." Courtney's parents are strict, they only let her eat healthy foods, and in a certain quantity.
There was no food left. Courtney had a big belly. Two of the girls on the other team are also a bit bloated, but neither of their bellies compare to Courtney's, which looks pregnant.
She and the rest of the contestants are shocked to find out, once again, the challenge was fake. The real challenge, is to stay awake as long as possible. Can Courtney really stay up for a long period of time? She's already exhausted from the run, and stuffing herself didn't help.

Twelve hours in, and somehow, everyone is still awake. Courtney is not feeling good, she's exhausted, her stomachache from overeating earlier has not gone away.
Not being able to hold it anymore, Courtney rips out a fart. The fart has attracted a lot of attention, contestants from both teams are making comments. Courtney chuckles, "Uh... Excuse me." She was embarrassed, but at least her stomachache lessened.
113.title: On th Island without the pressure of society, s...

1132.content:
Four hours later and the first of the contestants were nodding off. Thankfully everyone seemed to have moved on from her little gas attack and just focusing on staying awake. Courtney tried to keep moving in hopes that it would help. She eyed the other campers to see who would be the next to fall. Gwen and Trent were laying side by side, Heather was talking to Beth and Lindsay. She couldn't hear either conversation but she also didn't really care. All that mattered was that her team won. Even if she passed out, all they needed was to stay awake longer than the Screaming Gophers. She needed a way to keep them up but how?

PPPPBBBBBBRRRLLLLTTTT!

Her train of thought was interrupted by the slumbering oaf Owen who let one rip as he slept. The contestants closest to Owen stirred and groaned from the smell. Seeing this, Courtney had an idea. One that she was hesitant to enact but she had no choice. There was no way she could lug Owen to her team's side and all her side stepping was not doing wonders for her stomach. Her meal from before sloshed in her gut and gurgled as it was being digested, spurring a small burp from the CIT. She could feel the pressure building in her backside and wasn't going to wait around. With trepidation, she shut her eyes and let it rip.

PPPPPPPPPPBBBBBBBBLLLLRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPTTTTTTT!

To the disgust and surprise of many of the teens, Courtney actually managed to top Owen's previous fart in loudness and stink. She was met with groans and childish laughter from the others, and one cry of approval from Izzy. It was humiliating but her team did look livelier. Plus she imagined they would have trouble sleeping with the smell of baked beans wafting in the air.

And so, for the next several hours, Courtney was startle her team was random bouts of butt burps throughout the challenge, letting the pressure build until it was just right. Yes she looked foolish but she reasoned that the others would do something far worse eventually. That prediction came true as a naked, sleep walking Owen wandered into the woods. And she figured her team would cheer and praise her ingenuity once they won the contest. Plus, it felt so good letting all that gas out in one big push and the satisfaction that came after. It was getting harder for her to hide the relief on her face after every release.

As the hours ticked away, everyone did succumb to sleep one after another. Despite her efforts, Courtney too fell into a deep sleep. When she came to, Chris was waking the others up with a air horn pointed into a mega phone and was ready to announce the winning team.

Courtney had clearly taken an early lead but she suddenly felt a pain in her lower belly. The pressure began to mount until suddenly:

"You're going to be my good luck charm, aren't you Mr. Tiki?"

When Beth has missed the instructions on where to go, she had also missed the warning by Chris, to not take ANYTHING from Boney Island, as the place had a dreaded curse.

During the trip, she had grabbed a small Tiki head, unaware of it's curse.

1211.content:
(Originally written by Dustin on a REALLY OLD interactive)

Beth sat on top of her bunk in the girls' Screaming Gophers cabin. She was reading a book, when her stomach rumbled loudly through the cabin.

*GRRRRMMMBLLRRRGG!*

The other girls stared at Beth, clutching her tummy. "Oops..." She giggled sheepishly, "Guess I'm a little hungry! Be right back!" She gave her tiki idol souvenir a kiss and picked it up. "You can come with me, pretty idol thingy!" She put the statue in her pocket, never once noticing its glowing red eyes as she climbed off her bunk.

Beth hummed to herself as she walked to the mess hall, her belly growling, echoing through the camp. "Euurgh.... that's strange, I'm usually NEVER hungry this late at night... Oh well!" She shrugged it off, her mind wandering to visions of roast chicken, entire pizzas with everything on it, hamburgers with layers of melted cheese and grease rolling down the sides... THUNK! Beth walked right into the side of the mess hall! She shook it off and stepped into the tent, but was disappointed at what she saw. Chef had already left! "AWwww man..." She sighed, clutching her gurgling gut. Her disappointment washed away seconds later, when she had an idea. "Hmmmm... Chef won't mind if I help myself..." She looked from side to side, making sure nobody was watching. She took small, quiet tip-toe steps over to the backroom, making sure that nobody would catch her in the act. About halfway there, she darted to the door and slammed it behind her. Beth clutched her side, huffing and puffing, trying to catch her breath. "Whew... THAT was close..." she sighed to herself. Her eyes lit up. Right there in the back room, right on the table, was a buffet of delicious foods, already cooked and prepared, as if someone KNEW she was coming. It... was slightly unsettling, but Beth wasn't going to argue. "Woooow... it all looks so TASTY!" She licked her lips. All her favorites were there: Roast chicken, entire pizzas with everything on it, hamburgers with layers of melted cheese and grease rolling down the sides... along with a smorgasbord of other delicious dishes! She pulled out the statue. "Where to start, huh, little guy?" She giggled, placing it on the table. Beth pulled a leg of the warm, roast chicken off and took a deep whiff. "Mmmmmm... Chef REALLY outdid himself this time!" She took a bite... as soon as her teeth dug into the juicy drumstick, the tiki's eyes started to glow. Beth's eyes shot open. "Mmmmmmmm, this is DELICIOUS!" within minutes she had stripped it to the bone! "*URP!* Hehee! Excuse me!" she giggled, savoring the wonderful flavor still in her throat and mouth. She sucked the delicious chicken-y taste off of her fingers. It was just too much to bare! She needed more... She started taking big, wild bites out of the entire chicken, bits of meat and saliva flying every which way! After about... five minutes, the chicken was nothing but bones. Beth's bulging tummy was threatening to blast the button off her pants right there! "Ahhhh.... * BUURROOOARRPPT!* Mmmm, that was GREAT!" Her stomach growled and gurgled. "Hmmm, I'm still kinda hungry though..." she lamented, patting her stuffed gut... Lucky for her, she had an entire kitchen full of delicious foods to choose from! She stood herself up and walked along the edge of the table, bringing a big spoon of mashed potatoes and gravy to her mouth, swallowing down the whole thing. "Mmmm!" She licked her lips before pressing her face right into the bowl, eating up all she could! The whole time, her little tiki friend staring at her with those evil, glowing red eyes...

What happens next?

"Lindsay?" Heather called, sitting impatiently on her cabin bed, "Beth?"

There was no answer. For some reason, despite being 100% sure she was the most popular, coolest girl in the whole camp, no-one ever seemed to want to spend their free time with Heather. It was most bizarre.

Unless, the reason no-one wished to spend time with her was because of her. But, no, that couldn't be it. Heather was perfect. She was sure of that. Well, she thought she was sure. She was starting to doubt herself. Her eyes moved upwards towards a mirror, where her pristine reflection stared back at her. She'd always thought of it as perfect, but now, she was starting to notice the little flaws. The loose strands of hair, the spot on her cheek, it had all avoided her glance beforehand. Was she.... too vain? It then hit her. Everyone avoided her because they thought she was too vain. And she was! She somehow needed to change this, make everyone realise that she's imperfect too, and she knows she is. But how could she do that?

Her eyes glanced over to a bar of chocolate on the windowsill, and suddenly her stomach rumbled. For so long she had continued to diet, but now, the urge to eat was overcoming her. What could she do?

However there was just one problem: she was starving. Lately she had been trying to get a job, but she kept messing up and getting fired. Plus, she had been going on a diet and trying to get thinner, and would kill for a hamburger. She clutched her stomach as it growled.



GRGRGRGRGRGRLLLL!



“Owww, my tummy hurts.” She moaned.



Suddenly, she saw a bright flashes coming from a building. Curious, she went into the building and saw a bunch of beautiful models and a photographer taking pictures of one. Lindsay entered and asked one of the models, “Um, excuse me? What’s this line for?”



“*Scoff* This is a line to audition for a new modeling agency. Rumor has it that the models get paid a lot.” Said a french model



“Ooooh, that sounds fun. Can I audition?”



“Yes, but this is a job for professionals and I doubt you have what it takes.”



With that, the French model went to audition. Before Lindsay could say a word, she smelled something. She followed it to the crafts table, which had tons of food. It had pizza, chips, salsa, hot dogs, punch, cocktail weenies, etc. Lindsay noticed no one had even tried to eat anything, and decided it wouldn’t hurt to have a chip. As soon as it entered her mouth, Lindsay’s eyes bulged out in surprise.



“Oh my gosh, this is delicious!” she said. “Oh wait! My diet. I need to watch my figure. But this food is soooooooo good. What do I do?” she wondered.

The sun shined through a window as Bridgette slept in after another one of Geoff's wild parties. Her stomach rose as she inhaled and slept peacefully. She had stayed up very late the other night and really needed to get some much needed sleep.



PRRFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRTT!!



Bridgette farted in her sleep, a habit she had started ever since she and Geoff moved in together. When the two finished high school and discovered that their colleges weren't far apart, the two decided to live together in an apartment. They were pleased to find out that the apartment was very big and roomy and very cheap. probably because the landlord was a huge fan of TDI. At first Bridgette thought it would be like seeing what being married to Geoff would be like and at first, it was perfect. Then Geoff started having parties.



Whenever the two weren't hosting the Aftermath show or doing homework, Geoff would throw wild parties. He'd call as many people as he knew from college or from Total Drama, order a ton of junk food, and blast loud music and start to party. Bridgette didn't mind the parties because she knew Geoff liked to party, and so did she. During the parties, she'd meet other surfers, practice her dance moves, catch up with the cast mates, or have make-out sessions with Geoff. However most of the time, she would go on a feeding frenzy.



Geoff always bought the unhealthiest, fattening, carb-filled junk food he could find that no one could resist. Although Geoff could make amazing pasta, he usually spent their grocery money and junk food for parties, whether he had one planned or not so Bridgette had no choice but to have junk food for almost every meal. Not to mention that with the free time that would have been used to cook healthy meals, they had more time to do homework, plan new parties, but mostly make out. Bridgette usually had some self-control when it came to eating junk food and sometimes would go out just to have a salad or something, but during Geoff's parties she lost it. Bridgette was usually forced to eat a lot during the parties because the food usually ran out pretty quickly. As a result, people knew her as a party glutton.



Most of the time at the parties, people would start chanting "chug, chug, chug" or "eat, eat, eat" or spout other encouraging phrases that turned Bridgette's light snack into a buffet. Plus, she was always encouraged to participate in eating challenges whenever there was one. Bridgette couldn't help herself because she liked it when people started to cheer her on when she stuffed her face or let out some loud gas, be it from the mouth or butt. Either way, when she woke up the next morning she felt some regret.



By now it was 10:30 in the morning and the smell of her gas irritated Bridgette as she slept. She rolled over in her sleep and accidentally fell off the couch.



BOOF!



Bridgette hit the floor hard and woke up instantly. She moaned as she rubbed her head and gradually got up. "Oohhhhh, my head." she muttered as her eyes adjusted to the light and her headache got better. Her stomach gurgled as it digested the enormous amount of food she ate last night.



PFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTT!!



Her ass spewed more of her fumes loudly. She rubbed her upset stomach and noticed that it grew recently. She went into the bathroom and saw herself in the mirror. From partying so much, Bridgette was over 200 pounds. Her B-cups were now C-cups, her hips were twice as large and her ass half as big as Owen's. She poked her stomach and watched it wobble and make her look like a nine-month pregnant woman.



Bridgette had noticed her recent rise in size and had a feeling they were caused by Geoff's parties, but now she was convinced. She realized that if she kept this up she'd be bigger than Owen eventually. She pulled her shirt down, or tried to so she could cover her belly, and decided....

15322.content:
"No....no that's not possible....I CAN'T HAVE GAINED 5 POUNDS?!?"
Blaineley stared at disbelief at the scale. It was true, actually 6 pounds, to be exact.

Despite constantly portraying herself as the attractive, slightly older woman, Blaineley had alot to hide.
Her real name was Mildred, she had a gas problem, and she was overweight.
To make matters worse, it hadn't even gathered in the right places. Back when she was first starting, the extra weight had gone to her hips and butt, making her curvy, but soon it grew too big, and her fat gathered in an unsightly potbelly, she kept hidden with the best corsets money could buy.
It had been exposed on Total Drama The Aftermath(along with her bowel issues) but her PR team had managed to get the situation under wraps.

Now, it was once again starting to spiral out of control.
She SWORE she would stabilize the problem, but one thing lead to another, some pizza here, some cake there, recent competition with other hosts had driven her stress through the roof.

Walking up to the mirror, she could hardly bare to observe the damage.
Her pot belly was rapidly widening into hanging gut. Her breasts, already requiring implants and a special bra, were getting saggier, and a quick pinch revealed her butt was softening(not the biggest issue, but it was already large to start with)

Sigh "How do those other hosts do it?" she asked herself pessimistically, reaching for her corset as usual.
Except, unlike usual, it didn't fit. At all.

"No...onononononoonono, This can't be happening." she said. After several minutes, she BARELY managed to squeeze into it, although breathing was nearly impossible.
She almost immediately pulled it off, allowing her gut to surge forth.

Falling back on her couch, Blainely sighed, before leaning over to rip a rank fart. Lately, her digestive issues seemed force then ever. Her endless game of outrunning age seemed to be finally catching up with her. And that was the largest corset available that could compress her down to a size 4.

She had a show to do tonight, but right now, that didn't matter. All that mattered was relaxing at her TV, in her panties, with her preciousake and pizza.
This was truly the life, she thought, scratching her armpit.
